name: plasma Blast
description:
is a top-down shooter game with elements

bullet hell and roglike 

your goal is to get out of the station you need to go through 4 locations

1 station

2-stone planet

3 bed hotel

4-cult of triangles

the game is very smooth because of hellish bullets

there are 3 characters

1-Jace

2-soldier of the 24th legion

3-beginner
